i am a student at a small community college.

content.text: Hello! I'm a welder and rock climber. How's your day going?
Hi! I'm a student at a small community college. I'm excited to start my new life in San Diego!
That's great! What are you studying?
I'm majoring in English. I love to read romance novels.
I love to read classical music while I organize my office supplies.
That's a unique hobby. Do you have a favorite composer?
I'm not sure I could pick a favorite composer, but I love listening to Beethoven.
I love Beethoven too! His music is so beautiful.
I agree! It's definitely one of my favorites.
I'm also a lifeguard and I love working out.
That's great! I used to be a lifeguard. It's a lot of fun.
Yeah, it is! I love being in the water.
Me too! I'm so glad I'm moving to San Diego. It's so close to the ocean.
I'm sure you'll love it there!
